Check-property-is-there-or-not_key1: You can check whether property exists or not in an object.
Check-property-is-there-or-not_key2: We can use the .hasOwnProperty(propname) method of objects to determine if that object has the given property name.
Check-property-is-there-or-not_key3: .hasOwnProperty() returns true or false if the property is found or not.
Check-property-is-there-or-not_key4: For checking property is there or not,
Check-property-is-there-or-not_key5: objectName.hasOwnProperty(PropertyName); will gives either true or false.
Check-property-is-there-or-not_key6: myDetails.hasOwnProperty("name"); this will returns true because property name is there object named myDetails.
